directions: Mix parsley, scallions, capers, and red onion together in a bowl; add 1 tablespoon olive oil, salt, and pepper and mix well. Stir eggs into mixture.
Arrange romaine leaves on a serving platter; add a salmon slice to each leaf and top with egg mixture. Garnish each cup with parsley and a lemon wedge.
ingredients: 1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley, or to taste
title: Lettuce Cups with Smoked Salmon and Eggs
